short_description: fastpath function to perform histogram calculation on a data set.
long_description: fastpath function to perform histogram calculation on a data set, which accepts either auto-generated bins, Equal-Width bins and Variable-Width bins, output <ColumnName, label, MinValue, MaxValue, CountOfValues, bin_percent>.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

input_tables.name: MinMax
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains bin data for EQUAL-WIDTH and VARIABLE-WIDTH.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains bin data for EQUAL-WIDTH and VARIABLE-WIDTH.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which histogram computation is to be done.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which histogram computation is to be done.

argument_clauses.name: MethodType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {STURGES, SCOTT, EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the MethodType which will be used for histogram computation. Supported MethodType are {STURGES, SCOTT, EQUAL-WIDTH, VARIABLE-WIDTH}.

argument_clauses.name: NBins
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the integer value which will specify the number of ranges or bins. If only 1 value is specified, then it will be applied to all the target columns, else the number of NBins values must be equal to the number of target columns.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the integer value which will specify the number of ranges or bins. If only 1 value is specified, then it will be applied to all the target columns, else the number of NBins values must be equal to the number of target columns.

argument_clauses.name: Inclusion
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify whether to include points on bin boundaries in the bin on the left or the bin on the right. If only 1 value is specified, then it will be applied to all the target columns, else the number of Inclusion values must be equal to the number of target columns.
argument_clauses.description: Specify whether to include points on bin boundaries in the bin on the left or the bin on the right. If only 1 value is specified, then it will be applied to all the target columns, else the number of Inclusion values must be equal to the number of target columns.

argument_clauses.name: GroupbyColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the names of the InputTable columns that contain the group values for binning.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the names of the InputTable columns that contain the group values for binning.
